attributes.title: Mission Attappadi
attributes.description:
Talrop aims to transform Attappadi into a hub for tourism, agriculture, IT, and e-commerce, teeming with IT talent and commercial infrastructure. Leveraging the resource pool of three communities and 192 ooru in Attappadi, Talrop is stimulating socio-economic development by training manpower, building infrastructure, and fully utilizing the beautiful land.


In 2021, as part of Phase I, Talrop and an NGO established a mini IT Park in Attappadi, training local students. By 2023, six of them joined Talrop as Software Engineers. As part of Phase II, a second group of 400 students is currently undergoing training through the mini IT Park.

Over a 1000 events have been conducted around Kerala to this end, and the effort is ongoing.

children.text: Role description :
Senior Graphic Designer at Talrop will be responsible for creating and designing graphics, logos and branding material on a day-to-day basis.

Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design or a related field.

Knowledge of digital media and design trends.
Proficiency in Graphics, Graphic Design and Typography.
Experience in video editing and motion graphics is a plus.
Responsibilities :
Lead and guide the creative team, providing artistic direction and ensuring cohesion in design projects.
Collaborate with stakeholders, including clients and cross-functional teams, to understand project goals and requirements.
Develop innovative and strategic design concepts, considering branding, messaging and target audience.

Execute high-level graphic design, creating visually appealing materials for both
digital and print platforms.
Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, ensuring they are completed on time and within budget.

Oversee the entire design process, from concept to delivery, ensuring quality and
consistency.

Provide guidance and mentorship to junior designers, fostering their professional
growth and creativity.
Ensure the highest standards of design quality, reviewing and approving the work of the creative team.
Skills Required :
Advanced proficiency in graphic design software and tools, including Adobe Creative Suite.
Ability to work collaboratively, take direction and meet project objectives in a timely manner.
Strategic thinking and the ability to align designs with business objectives.
Strong leadership and interpersonal skills, with the ability to communicate effectively.
Exceptional creativity and a keen eye for detail.

children.text: Role description :

As a Junior Python/Django Developer at Talrop, you will be an integral part of our development team, responsible for designing, implementing and maintaining the backend infrastructure of our software applications. You will primarily work with Python, Django and PostgreSQL to develop scalable and efficient backend  solutions. This position is ideal for a highly motivated individual who is passionate about software development, enjoys problem-solving and has a strong foundation in backend development using Python and related technologies.
Qualifications :

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field (or equivalent
experience).
Experience working with Django framework and building RESTful APIs.
Knowledge of containerization technologies like Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes.
Familiarity with cloud platforms and services (e.g. AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
Responsibilities :
Write clean, efficient and maintainable code that adheres to industry standards and best practices.
Design, develop and maintain backend systems using Python, Django and PostgreSQL.
Ensure the scalability, performance and security of the backend infrastructure.
Collaborate with the frontend team to integrate backend functionality with the user interface.
Perform code reviews, identify and address any issues or bugs.
Collaborate with the development team to understand project requirements and translate them into technical solutions.

Familiarity with version control systems such as Git.
As a
Program Manager for Startups Incubation

at Talrop, you will play a pivotal role in identifying, nurturing, and strategizing the growth of startups within our ecosystem. You will be responsible for bringing in new startups, supporting existing ones, and ensuring a conducive environment for their success. Your strategic acumen and operational excellence will drive the incubation process forward, fostering innovation and business development.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Startup Identification and Onboarding:
○ Actively scout for promising startups and evaluate their alignment with
Talrop’s strategic objectives.
○ Manage the onboarding process for new startups, ensuring smooth
integration into Talrop’s incubation program.
2. Support and Mentorship:
○ Provide hands-on support and mentorship to startups, leveraging your
expertise to help them overcome challenges and achieve milestones.
○ Facilitate access to resources, networks, and partnerships essential for
startup growth and scalability.
3. Program Management:
○ Develop and implement incubation programs tailored to the needs of
different startups, fostering innovation and sustainable business practices.
○ Monitor and evaluate the progress of startups, identifying opportunities for improvement and expansion.
4. Strategic Planning:
○ Collaborate with senior management to develop long-term strategies for
startup incubation and ecosystem development.
○ Drive initiatives to enhance Talrop’s reputation as a leading incubator
and innovation hub.
5. Relationship Management:
○ Cultivate strong relationships with stakeholders including founders,
investors, industry experts, and government bodies.
○ Represent Talrop in industry events, conferences, and networking forums
to promote our incubation initiatives.
Required Skills and Qualifications:
● Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Management, Entrepreneurship, or a related field. Master’s degree preferred.
● Proven experience in startup incubation, venture capital, or entrepreneurship development.
● Strong understanding of startup ecosystem dynamics, challenges, and opportunities.
● Excellent project management skills with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
● Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to influence and build rapport with diverse stakeholders.
● Strategic thinker with a proactive and innovative approach to problem-solving.
● Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment and drive results.
Preferred Qualifications:
● Experience in a managerial or leadership role within a startup incubator or accelerator program.
● Knowledge of emerging technologies, market trends, and industry best practices in startup growth.
● Previous experience working with government agencies or economic development organizations is a plus.
Why Join Talrop:
● Opportunity to make a significant impact on the startup ecosystem in Kochi and beyond.
● Collaborative and supportive work environment that fosters creativity and innovation.

attributes.title: Academic Instructor
attributes.description: Academic Instructor at Talrop will be responsible for delivering high-quality education to students, fostering an engaging and productive learning environment and contributing to the development of the academic program.

children.text: Role Description:

Academic Instructor at Talrop will be responsible for delivering high-quality education to students, fostering an engaging and productive learning environment and contributing to the development of the academic program.
Qualification:
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering, or a related field with a specialization in electronics.
Prior teaching experience at the post-secondary level, preferably in electronics or related subjects.
Responsibility:
Teaching :

Deliver dynamic and interactive lectures, laboratory sessions, and workshops in electronics-related subjects, such as circuit analysis, digital electronics, and microcontrollers. Develop hands-on activities and projects to reinforce theoretical concepts and enhance students' practical skills in electronic circuit design, troubleshooting, and instrumentation.
Curriculum Development :

Design, update, and modify course syllabi, instructional materials, and laboratory experiments to align with industry standards and emerging technologies in electronics. Integrate relevant case studies, real-world examples, and industry applications into the curriculum to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of electronics principles and practices.
Assessment :

Create and administer assessments, including quizzes, exams, and practical demonstrations, to evaluate students' comprehension of electronic theory and their ability to apply concepts to solve problems. Provide constructive feedback on student work and performance to support their academic growth and encourage continuous improvement.
Advising and Mentorship :

Offer academic advising to students pursuing degrees or certificates in electronics, guiding them on course selection, program requirements, and career pathways in the field. Provide mentorship and support to students, particularly those interested in pursuing research projects, internships, or professional certifications related to electronics.
Research and Innovation :

Engage in scholarly research and innovation in electronics, focusing on areas such as analog and digital circuit design, embedded systems, signal processing, or emerging technologies like Internet of Things (IoT) and robotics. Disseminate research findings through publications in peer-reviewed journals, conference presentations, and collaborations with industry partners.
Professional Development :

Stay current with advancements in electronics technology, pedagogy, and industry trends through professional development activities, conferences, workshops, and participation in professional organizations. Explore innovative teaching methodologies and educational technologies to enhance student learning experiences and promote active engagement in the classroom.
Skills Required:
Strong technical knowledge and expertise in electronics principles, circuit analysis, semiconductor devices, and related software tools (e.g., MATLAB, SPICE, CAD).
Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey complex concepts clearly and effectively to diverse audiences.
Dedication to student-centred learning, active engagement, and fostering a supportive and inclusive learning environment.
Commitment to continuous professional development and innovation in teaching and research.

attributes.title: Site Engineer
attributes.description: The Site Engineer at Talrop will be responsible for overseeing day-to-day construction activities, ensuring compliance with project plans and specifications and maintaining a safe and efficient work environment on-site. This role requires strong technical knowledge, excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with project teams and subcontractors.

children.text: Role description :

The Site Engineer at Talrop will be responsible for overseeing day-to-day construction activities, ensuring compliance with project plans and specifications and maintaining a safe and efficient work environment on-site. This role requires strong technical knowledge, excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with project teams and subcontractors.
Qualifications :
Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management or related field.
3+ years of experience in construction, supervision of projects.
Responsibilities :

Oversee all on-site construction activities, including site preparation, excavation, foundation work, structural erection, MEP installations and finishing works, to ensure adherence to project plans, specifications and quality standards.
Implement and enforce quality control measures to ensure that construction activities meet or exceed industry standards and client expectations.
Enforce strict safety protocols and ensure compliance with health and safety regulations to maintain a safe working environment for all personnel on-site.
Coordinate construction activities to ensure that project milestones and deadlines are met and progress is tracked according to the project schedule.
Monitor material deliveries, inventory levels and usage on-site and coordinate with procurement teams to ensure timely availability of materials and supplies as per project requirements.
Coordinate with subcontractors, suppliers and vendors to ensure timely mobilisation, effective collaboration and resolution of issues affecting construction progress.
Maintain accurate records of daily construction activities, including site reports, progress photos, inspection reports and as-built drawings, in compliance with project documentation requirements.
Identify opportunities for process improvement, innovation and efficiency enhancement on-site and contribute to lessons learned sessions to support ongoing organisational learning and development.
Skills Required :
Strong technical knowledge of construction methods, materials and building codes.
Proficiency in reading and interpreting construction drawings, plans and specifications.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with multidisciplinary teams and stakeholders.
Familiarity with construction management software (e.g. Procore, Primavera, Microsoft Project) is a plus.
Willingness to work on-site and adapt to changing work conditions and schedules.
